sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { createPageUrl } from "@/utils"; export default function Guide() { const [selectedTopic, setSelectedTopic] = useState(null); const guideTopics = [ { id: "basics", title: "RICE BASICS", icon: "📚", content: [ "RICE TO WATER RATIOS:", "• SHORT GRAIN: 1:1.25", "• MEDIUM GRAIN: 1:1.5", "• LONG GRAIN: 1:1.75", "• BROWN RICE: +25% WATER", "", "GENERAL RULE:", "75G RICE = 1 SERVING", "150G RICE = 2-3 SERVINGS", "300G RICE = FAMILY SIZE" ] }, { id: "troubleshooting", title: "TROUBLESHOOTING", icon: "🔧", content: [ "RICE TOO STICKY/MUSHY:", "• USE 10% LESS WATER", "• RINSE RICE MORE THOROUGHLY", "• REDUCE COOKING TIME", "", "RICE TOO DRY/HARD:", "• ADD 2-3 TBSP HOT WATER", "• COOK 2-3 MINUTES MORE", "• INCREASE WATER NEXT TIME", "", "RICE BURNT ON BOTTOM:", "• LOWER HEAT SETTING", "• USE HEAVIER POT", "• DON'T LIFT LID TOO EARLY" ] }, { id: "types", title: "RICE VARIETIES", icon: "🌾", content: [ "JASMINE RICE:", "• AROMATIC, SLIGHTLY STICKY", "• GREAT FOR ASIAN DISHES", "• COOK TIME: 18 MINUTES", "", "BASMATI RICE:", "• LONG GRAIN, FLUFFY", "• PERFECT FOR CURRY", "• COOK TIME: 15 MINUTES", "", "ARBORIO RICE:", "• SHORT GRAIN, CREAMY", "• IDEAL FOR RISOTTO", "• COOK TIME: 20 MINUTES", "", "WILD RICE:", "• NUTTY FLAVOR, CHEWY", "• TAKES LONGER TO COOK", "• COOK TIME: 45 MINUTES" ] }, { id: "tips", title: "PRO TIPS", icon: "💡", content: [ "BEFORE COOKING:", "• RINSE RICE 2-3 TIMES", "• SOAK BASMATI 15 MINUTES", "• USE HEAVY-BOTTOMED POT", "", "DURING COOKING:", "• NEVER LIFT THE LID", "• KEEP HEAT CONSISTENT", "• DON'T STIR THE RICE", "", "AFTER COOKING:", "• LET REST 5-10 MINUTES", "• FLUFF WITH FORK", "• SERVE IMMEDIATELY", "", "STORAGE:", "• REFRIGERATE UP TO 5 DAYS", "• FREEZE UP TO 6 MONTHS", "• REHEAT WITH DAMP PAPER TOWEL" ] } ]; if (selectedTopic) { const topic = guideTopics.find(t => t.id === selectedTopic); return (
{/* Header */}
{topic.title}
HOME
{/* Topic Icon */}
{topic.icon}
{topic.title}
{/* Content */}
{topic.content.map((line, index) => (
{line}
))}
{/* Quick Actions */}
► START COOKING
); } return (
{/* Header */}
← BACK
RICE GUIDE
HELP
{/* Welcome */}
📖
RICE COOKING GUIDE
LEARN THE BASICS
{/* Topic List */}
{guideTopics.map((topic) => ( ))}
{/* Quick Tips */}
⚡ QUICK TIP:
ALWAYS RINSE YOUR RICE UNTIL THE WATER RUNS CLEAR. THIS REMOVES EXCESS STARCH AND PREVENTS STICKY RICE!
{/* Status */}
SELECT TOPIC TO CONTINUE
); }
